pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, April 3, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local 

Val-d’Or, Quebec

11:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local grocery store to meet with families and employees.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity 

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement on Budget 2023 measures that will make life more affordable for Canadians. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:50 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

La Corne, Quebec 

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with employees of Sayona.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

Media appearance:

8:15 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Radio-Canada’s in Abitibi-Témiscamingue Des matins en or with David Chabot.
